channel.title: mathling tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from mathling.

item.description: @LinguaCelta I am so here for the new "Star Trek: Klingons in Wales"
item.source:markdown: @LinguaCelta I am so here for the new "Star Trek: Klingons in Wales"

item.title: GenerativeArt interlude
item.description:
Hex Katakamuna

Because why do something on a rectangular grid when you can do it on a hex grid?

#XQuery #SVG https://t.co/BTWV3TNJXl

That said, the hex layout looks messier I tried to make the same kinds of symbols, but some of them have odd asymmetries https://t.co/AzIC6cdS86
